data.message: Not sure if I will get a response, since FB does not respond to help questions, but here goes.  I am not getting notifications from my family and friends, only groups and a few stragglers.  Can you help or not?  I have not changed any of my settings.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you're having trouble with notifications, Marsha. You can adjust what you're notified about and how you're notified by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1x9XJlR.  You can also add people to your Close Friends list and receive a notification each time they post. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/1x9XJlV.  -Jenny

You didn't even read what I wrote.  I have everything set to receive notifications, they have not changed.  But the last time you updated and changed this site I stopped getting notifications.  Now I have to visit each family or friend that I used to get notifications from.  Do you even care?
We hear you, Marsha. This sounds like a bug. Can you please report it at: http://on.fb.me/1xakWnZ? The more detail you provide the better. -Jenny
Is it on ur phone or on desktop/laptop?! If ur phone, check ur phone settings... Mine did that for a while till I changed it in setting of the phone... Hope that helps....

I am having problems with facebook too !! It freezes up on me.  I increased my computer speed and space on my computer and facebook stills freezes up on me on the timeline page and photos.  I can't even read all the things that have been posted to me.  I have sent facebook a message but have not  received a reply.  I am so aggraviated !!  Does anyone have any suggestions??  So glad you got a reply from facebook.
It's my desk top.  I've tried three things that FB sent to me and we'll see today.  LOL
I love you?ame gine tume khub chlu & ame gine na ke korta porbo  I am pried of tumer jino ame chi tume plus paba so ame tumer pasa sob somi ace  para suna ta mon du yuo are good gil  love er by?
pless akhon na pora dibo bolse I priomes  you ?
ame boulse sona tume paba&love gin ?
ame sinse grup na kinto amer pise vakarun nasa tacher tume sob kiso paba pless I love you ? My gin @
tumer ma amak duckta chi ca balo yer ;& love gin pake?
tume chu ame mara ji balo ke ?
zine tumer anok jid tumer ma amk dukcha amer satha kotha hoica ame samner budbara asbo takhon tume ja boul ba ti korbo ame pless gin a love?
